mapper.select: SELECT t_personinformation.personid as code,t_personinformation.gender, phone as account,personname as name,facepath as headUrl,bailoutbegindate as startDate,bailoutenddate as endDate,sponsor as inChargePerson, contact as inChargeContract from t_personinformation FULL JOIN t_user ON t_personinformation.personid = t_user.personid WHERE t_user.personid=#{userId}
select * from t_user where personid =#{userId} and password=#{password}
mapper.update: update t_user set password=#{newPassword} where personid =#{userId}
